articles.title: Climate report: Africa's rare glaciers soon to disappear - Associated Press
articles.description: NAIROBI, Kenya (AP) — Africa’s rare glaciers will disappear in the next two decades because of climate change, a new report warned Tuesday amid sweeping forecasts of pain for the continent that contributes least to global warming but will suffer from it most.
